roleset.name: cause to become affixed to something
roleset.note: FIXATE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls shake-22.3-2-1, focus-87.1. Comparison to 'affix'. (from fixate.01-v)

roles.note: Includes instances where one fixates oneself or one's attention (inferred but not stated) on someone or something. (from fixate.01-v)

example.name: obsession
example.text: He fixates on his mother, even at the age of 40.

example.name: theme, no agent
example.text: Her eyes fixated on a point on the horizon.
example.arg: on a point on the horizon

example.name: affix
example.text: Let's fixate the picture to the frame.

example.name: Arg0, 2
example.text: But Rick Santorum's fixation on men and dogs in inappropriate situations if really freaky.
example.arg: on men and dogs in inappropriate situations

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Internal fixation of the dorsally displaced distal radius fracture was performed through the dorsal approach.
example.arg: of the dorsally displaced distal radius fracture
